meanings.definition: A person who descends a rock face or other surface using a rope.
meanings.sent1: The group of abseilers slowly made their way down the steep cliff.
meanings.sent2: Many abseilers enjoy the thrill of rappelling down mountains.
meanings.sent3: The abseilers looked like spiders descending from a web as they rappelled down the building.
meanings.sent4: Watching the abseilers descend the waterfall was like witnessing a graceful dance with gravity.
meanings.sent5: The image of the abseilers hanging in mid-air will forever be etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in the activity of abseiling.
meanings.sent1: We saw a group of excited abseilers gearing up for their adventure.
meanings.sent2: The abseilers gathered at the base of the cliff before starting their descent.
meanings.sent3: The abseilers joked and laughed as they prepared to conquer the rock face.
meanings.sent4: The community of abseilers shared stories of their daring escapades.
meanings.sent5: The cheers of the abseilers echoed through the canyon as they rappelled down.
